question: Tī 'other comprehensive ( loss ) income before reclassifications' lāi-bīn, ūi-hē ê chi̍t ê chè-chè-lu̍t lē-hē siōng-tōa ê sún-sit?
answer: unrealized holding gains ( losses ) on derivatives

question: 3 'other comprehensive loss' ê hō͘ siau-chhut ê jī-sò͘ ê ha̍p-kè sī siáⁿ-mih?
Tī 2019 nî 11 goe̍h 2 ji̍t ê boé-kî cûn-chúi lāi-bīn, siáⁿ chi̍t ê hāng-bo̍k ū sió-sió-á ê cûn-chúi, án-ni chiah sió-sió-á ê hāng-bo̍k tī 2018 nî 11 goe̍h 3 ji̍t ê chho͘-chāi sī siáⁿ-mih?
Tiong tiong ê 'tsu~n tsuan' (total) uî-tiau-siu-sit ê sit-sûn (accumulated other comprehensive loss) tùi kî-tàu kàu bo̍k ê sî-kan-tōaⁿ ê kái-piàn sī chūi-chūi?
answer: Tsūi-tiau-siu-sit ê tsu~n tsuan sit-sûn tī si-kan-tōaⁿ chin tōa-pō͘-hun kèng-hóe, tùi -$58,440 cheng-ka kàu -$187,799. Che tāi-piáu tńg-lâi koh cheng-ka -$129,359 ê net sit-sûn, pí kî-tàu ê tsu~n tsuan sit-sûn cheng-ka chē kòe saⁿ pái.

question: Tī 'other comprehensive ( loss ) income' lāi-bīn, ū tī hiah-ê khu-he̍k lóng bô chòe-siâu (net loss) ê sî, in ê choân-pō͘ ha̍p-kè sûn-chûn tī 2019 nî 11 goe̍h 2 hō sī siáⁿ-chē?
Tī 2019 nî 11 goe̍h 2 ji̍t ê chóng sòng-sit téng-bīn, ū cheng-tōaⁿ ê 'chè-pò͘ sán-phín ê bô-si̍t chha-chōe' chiàm toā-sió sī hō-chúi tōa-sè?
Nāi-koán ' pension plans ' ê ' other comprehensive ( loss ) income ' siâⁿ-chò 24,344 ê lãi, m̄-sī chha-siâu ê chha-siâu, tōa-kiâⁿ November 2, 2019 té--ê lóng-chóng khai-siā sī siáⁿ-chōa?
Tī 'buē-lâi hō-khóa sǹg-chiàⁿ' ê chhiò-sûn (chih-sû chiok-tè) kap chòe-āu ê 'chòe-āu chòe-khóa sǹg-chiàⁿ' ê chhiò-sûn (chih-sû chiok-tè) chi-kan, ū chi̍t-ê tēng-sî ê koan-hē bē?
answer: Ū, sì-ê lūi-pia̍t lóng ū chi̍t-ê tēng-sî ê koan-hē. Hō͘ 'gōa-chè-pè gîn'、'sio̍k-ka-chāi' kap 'pēⁿ-kim-chè' ê sòaⁿ-ba̍k, ê sòaⁿ-ba̍k ū siaⁿ-tó͘. Hō͘ 'khó-í chòe-tāi bō-e̍k ê chè-chō', ê sòaⁿ-ba̍k ū siaⁿ-tó͘. Kàu-kah chòe-āu, kî-kan ê chòe-āu sòaⁿ-ba̍k ê chhiò-sûn (chih-sû chiok-tè) kah sòaⁿ-ba̍k ê chòe-āu chòe-khóa sǹg-chiàⁿ ê chhiò-sûn (chih-sû chiok-tè) ê siaⁿ-tó͘ hō-chi̍t-ê.

question: Tī chit ê phiau-chu̍t lāi-bīn, bô-kóng choân-pō͘ ê sòaⁿ-ba̍k, siáⁿ chi̍t-ê tiâu-ba̍k ê chu-liāu sī siāng tōa ê sû-chí (tō sī kóng, siāng tōa ê koan-îⁿ sû-chí)?
Tùi roll-forward lōe-tōe ( Ending Balance = Beginning Balance + 'other comprehensive ( loss ) income' ) lâi liân-kòan, jīn-tiāⁿ tē hāu-sòan bô tòe ê hòe-chè líng-he̍k ūi kái?
answer: ‘unrealized holding gains ( losses ) on available for sale securities’ chit ê líng-he̍k hōe-sòan bô tòe. I ê beginning balance -10 (cell C1) chiâⁿ 'other comprehensive ( loss ) income' 10 (cell C5) lâi tòe ê calculating ending balance sī 0, m̄-tī tòe ê ending balance 2,014 (cell C6) bô tòe.

question: 2018 nî kàu 2019 nî, pension plans kiám-chió liōng tô-chē?
